environment.name: SERVICE_MESSAGES
environment.value: [{name: web, receives: [user.details, user.not-found, user.updated, user.deleted, users.listed, users.created, tweets.listed, tweets.created, tweets.deleted]}, {name: users, receives: [users.create, users.list, user.get-details, user.update, user.delete]}, {name: tweets, receives:[tweets.create, tweets.list, tweets.get-details, tweets.update, tweets.delete]}]
